metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27772 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in ImageMagick in coders/bmp.c. An attacker who submits a crafted file that is processed by ImageMagick could trigger undefined behavior in the form of values outside the range of type `unsigned int`. This would most likely lead to an impact to application availability, but could potentially cause other problems related to undefined behavior. This flaw affects ImageMagick versions prior to 7.0.9-0.

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
